磤磤磤

磤字的基本解释

磤
yīn
〔砏（
p塶 ）磤〕见“砏1”。

磤
yǐn
象声词，雷声：“声訇磤其若震。”

磤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐn］
［《廣韻》於謹切，上隱，影。］
雷声。亦用以形容宏大的声音。
[②]［yīn］
［《集韻》於斤切，平欣，影。］
见“砏磤”。

磤字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磤； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页835第31
【廣韻】【正韻】於謹切【集韻】倚謹切，?音隱。雷聲。【何晏·景福殿賦】聲訇磤其若震。　又【集韻】同殷。【詩·召南】殷其雷。

磤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
磤字的起名意思

象声词，雷声。

yīn
〔砏(
p塶)磤] See "砏1".
Humble
yǐn
Onomatopoeia, thunder: "The sound is trembling."
Humble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐn］
["Guangyun" Yu Jinqie, Shangyin, Ying. ]
thunder. It is also used to describe the grand voice.
[②]［yīn］
["Ji Yun" Yu Jinqie, Ping Xin, Ying. ]
See "Jun Heng".
Humble
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　磤; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 835 31
[Guangyun] [Zhengyun] Yu Jinqie [Jiyun] Leaning on Jinqie, the sound is hidden. thunder. [He Yan·Jingfu Palace Fu] The sound is trembling.　[Jiyun] Same as Yin. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】Yin Qilei.
